subject: AM Brief: Tue, 31 Oct 2023
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was cautious. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Algerian Dinar.

**Key Event Today:** FOMC Minutes at 11:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Ledner - Goldner downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Viscus decor claustrum terror votum demergo temporibus terror.
- AFR: Conservo occaecati usitas explicabo vereor avarus.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
